summary: Request to automatically publish to npm with the 'next' tag on merge to main branch, allowing users to test new features and fixes before official releases without waiting for a release process.
userImpact: Users can test new SDK features and fixes earlier by installing the 'next' tag version, improving feedback loops for samples and documentation updates.
proposedFix: Implement automated npm publishing to 'next' tag on merge to main branch
resolutionDetails: Merged into issue #170 which implemented the automated release workflow
keyQuote: Automatically publish to npm with the `next` tag (`npm install temporalio@next`) on merge to `main`.
